name: Car Drift Racer
description:
The most popular car racing in the world are finally here! fine tune performance with top speed, acceleration, tires, suspension. Drift your car in the city traffic with fast speed, conquer street and sky in car racing overspeed a mix of high-octane driving and endless racing.

Features:
-Realistic 3D graphics
-Beautiful background music
-More amazing drift cars
-Customize the car you like
-Top racing experience in this game!
